Name: Battle Imagine - Brigand Guard Captain
Description:
Activates or advances Brigand Guard Captain's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Earth Shield.

Stunt! Earth Shield
Transforms into Elite: Brigand Guard Captain to gain Earth Shield, recovering a percentage of lost HP when you are attacked, up to 9 times. During this, your Endurance is increased.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
